```{r data generation, echo = FALSE, results = "hide"}
n = sample(1:4,1)
p = runif(1,0.02,0.98)

```

Question
========

Determine the probabilities when adding $n$ spins with chance $p$.





Solution
========

Make a table (for parts d and e).

| $x_i$ | $p_i$ | $p_i x_i$ | $x_i-\mu$ | $(x_i-\mu)^2$ | $p_i(x_i-\mu)^2$ | 
|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|
`r s2`
|=========|=========|=========|=========|=========|=========|
|     |     | $\sum p_i x_i = `r mu`$ |   |   | $\sum p_i(x_i-\mu)^2 = `r sum(c6)`$   |
|     |     | $\mu = `r mu`$ |   |   | $\sigma = \sqrt{\sum p_i(x_i-\mu)^2} = `r sig`$   |

Answerlist
--------

* `r p[exact]`
* `r ptwo`
* `r p[two[1]]*p[two[2]]`
* `r patlm`
* $\mu = `r mu`$
* $\sigma = `r sig`$
